---
id: put-split-transaction-process-payments
title: "Process All Payments Approved for the current date"
description: "Process payments of transactions that have 'APPROVED' status. Transactions will be aggregated for payment according to (payment type, debit account and credit account). If the 'disallowAggregation' attribute is 'true' the transaction will not be aggregated and individual payments will be made for these transactions."
sidebar_label: "Process All Payments Approved for the current date"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "put api-method"
info_path: reference/transactions/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-transactions
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Process All Payments Approved for the current date"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/split/transaction/process-payments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Process payments of transactions that have 'APPROVED' status. Transactions will be aggregated for payment according to (payment type, debit account and credit account). If the 'disallowAggregation' attribute is 'true' the transaction will not be aggregated and individual payments will be made for these transactions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"paymentBaseDate","description":"Process transactions with this payment date.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
